======= test output
identified ['A', 'I']
identified ['B']
identified ['C', 'G', 'c', 'g']
unidentified
identified ['d', 'f']
_ msg AAA[A,I]BBBBc[C,G,c,g]CCDDDDEEEEFFFF
asdad
[d,f]asdvadvbb
000000 
Errors unidentified:+2


So the message is:

AAA[A,I]BBBBc[C,G,c,g]CCDDDDEEEEFFFF
asdad
[d,f]asdvadvbb

..which is close to the original:

AAAABBBBCCCDDDDEEEEFFFF
asdad
dasdvadvbb
